head.title: Node.js Document Merging API | merge PDF Word Excel
head.description: Documents merging API for Node.js. Merge, split, swap, reorder and delete pages of PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, presentations, Visio, XPS & EPUB formats.

header.description: Flexible Merger API to easily combine, split, or modify PDF and Office Documents
